articles.title: Alibaba kicks off spending spree with US$1bil for cloud - The Star Online
articles.description: HONG KONG: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd’s cloud division has pledged US$1bil (RM4.1bil) to support startups in Asia, marking one of its largest outlays since the tech giant pledged to boost spending and move past a bruising antitrust investigation at home.
